i think it's fair to say that myself and
my CFO consider the move to Amazon Web
Services one of the best strategic
business decisions we've ever
[Music]
made and my name is Simon Crowder and
I'm the managing director of nearmap.com
in Sydney Australia nearmap.com has
developed IP in two key areas our camera
system that allows us to capture very
high resolution in fact the highest
resolution in the world currently today
aerial photography which we then process
uh using our software system in a matter
of hours and days and serve it to our

proprietary uh software uh blackbox
software systems so it was very
important to us that we uh were working
with a partner that allowed us to be
able to develop our own software in our
own way and at the end of the day we
felt that Amazon web services best
suited our kind of view of the world we
used the core range of Amazon web
services the Glacia product is a core
part of our storage strategy going
forward uh we've moved a vast amount of
raw data to storage in Glacia uh the
second uh area is S3 uh and the third
area is EC2 we've been uh managing our
own proprietary data centers in two
locations in Australia in Sydney and in
Perth the migration from our own
proprietary data centers to Amazon Web
Services has been probably the best
business decision I've made there's no
question at all that we're seeing uh
benefits throughout the business not
just in the engineering side of the
company uh anything that brings a smile
to my engineers' face is always good
with me and uh they're very happy with
the overall product experience but also
on the commercial side of the company
where we're serving our customers every

partner that delivers um and we have
great uptime and uh uh you know very
very minimal latency is very very
important to us and I think because we
have both production and distribution
requirements from Amazon Web Services
stability for us has been really key we
have reduced operating costs by factors
of hundreds of percent within our
business in Australia we've been working
with the federal government for the last
three years uh managing and overseeing
helping with their federal uh rebate
program the way this works is that the
federal government will give taxpayers a
rebate if they install a solar panel on
the roof uh we're the only company in
the country that can provide the
government with the most up-to-date
aerial imagery of the highest resolution
compared to other providers on the
marketplace that allows the government
be able to check the installation prior
to actually providing the rebate to the
application we've captured over 650
surveys of the main cities in Australia
over a million square kilometers of data
which translates into many hundreds of
terabytes um of data we were faced with
a big business decision which is how do
you store that in a cost-effective way
in in a robust and reliable way and so
um Glacia has proved to be uh a great uh
solution to that particular business
challenge which is um the need to deep
store original uh content nimap.com's
